species.name: patrat
descriptions: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won’t notice a foe coming from behind.
Extremely cautious, they take shifts to maintain a constant watch of their nest. They feel insecure without a lookout.
Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.

abilities.name: run-away
abilities.effect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

abilities.name: analytic
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.
